CWEs: CWE-79: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
description: The function is vulnerable to Cross-site Scripting (XSS) attacks. The function uses user input directly in the generation of HTML content. If the user input is not properly sanitized, an attacker could inject malicious scripts that would be executed when the generated HTML content is loaded by a web browser.
